sentence.Network_en: T-shirts now seem almost de rigueur in the West End.
sentence.Network_cn: T恤衫现在几乎成了伦敦西区时尚人士的必备之物。

sentence.Network_en: De Gaulle vetoed Britain's application to join the EEC.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴高乐驳回了英国加入欧洲经济共同体的申请。

sentence.Network_en: He was admitted to the Academie Culinaire de France.
sentence.Network_cn: 他获准加入法兰西厨艺学会。

auth_sentence.content: With De Gaulle's historic shouts of 'Paris humiliated!
auth_sentence.res_content: With De Gaulle's historic shouts of 'Paris humiliated!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With De Gaulle's historic shouts of 'Paris humiliated!

auth_sentence.content: Consuelo De Moraes even documented this behavior on film.
auth_sentence.res_content: Consuelo De Moraes even documented this behavior on film.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consuelo De Moraes even documented this behavior on film.

auth_sentence.content: De Hoop Scheffer described the apparent testing as unacceptable.
auth_sentence.res_content: De Hoop Scheffer described the apparent testing as unacceptable.
